Author: standragula-
Text: trust me it is not possible to gain a noticeable amount to where you clothes won’t fit of actual fat. it has to be water weight, which can take days to go down. i have days like this too where i freak out and look at my body and just know i’ve gained then a few days later i look thin again and everything is back to normal. take a deep breath and relax, everything will be okay i promise. a ton of carbs and other unknown factors can also cause bloating so it’s just temporary. i know how hard it is to wake up bloated i started recovery a few days before new years and it’s such a mind fuck. but it will be okay. try drinking peppermint tea or ginger lemon tea and eating less sodium. that helps me a lot.
